item.title: 吉姆-查诺斯谈 "比特币财政公司 "的坚果味
item.description:
为什么市场仍然如此怪异？【原文：

Why are markets still so weird?

】

item.title: 查诺斯警告人工智能回调，比特币财政公司 "荒唐 "了
item.description: 传奇空头吉姆-查诺斯（Jim Chanos）警告说，人们对人工智能的热情推动股市再创历史新高，但人工智能生态系统正接近潜在的回调。【原文：Enthusiasm for all things artificial intelligence has helped propel stocks to another all-time high, but the AI ecosystem is getting close to a potential pullback, warned legendary short-seller Jim Chanos.】

item.title: 奇货可居：吉姆-查诺斯谈市场为何如此怪异（播客）
item.description: 奇货可居：吉姆-查诺斯谈市场为何如此怪异（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: Jim Chanos on Why the Markets are So Weird (Podcast)】

item.title: ING称董事总经理 "过多"，将裁员230人
item.description: 荷兰国际集团（ING Groep NV）宣布了一轮裁员计划，主要针对高级管理人员，因为他们实在太多了。【原文：ING Groep NV announced a round of cuts focused on senior executives saying there are just too many of them.】

item.title: Orsted 股价因美国风能和太阳能税收规则计划收紧而下滑
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普最新版支出方案提出更积极地逐步取消对美国风能和太阳能项目的税收优惠后，Orsted A/S股价在上市首日下跌超过4%。【原文：Orsted A/S shares dropped more than 4% on the first day of trading after the latest version of President Donald Trump’s spending package proposed a more aggressive phase-out of tax incentives for US wind and solar projects.】

item.title: 高盛策略师称美国利润率面临关税的主要风险
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：US profit margins face a big test in the upcoming reporting season as investors assess the damage from President Donald Trump’s trade war, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 台币再次快速下跌，强化干预言论
item.description: 台币在尾盘突然暴跌，与上周五的走势如出一辙，引发了人们对央行再次干预以抑制货币走强的猜测。【原文：The Taiwan dollar slumped in a sudden move in late trading, following a pattern seen on Friday and fueling speculation the central bank intervened once more to curb strength in the currency.】

item.title: 阿达尼港口集团考虑发行 3.5 亿卢比债券
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的企业集团计划通过长期本币债券融资约 300 亿卢比（约合 3.51 亿美元），这是该公司近期一系列债务融资中的最新一笔。【原文：Billionaire Gautam Adani’s conglomerate plans to raise about 30 billion rupees ($351 million) through long-term local currency bonds, according to people familiar with the matter, the latest in a string of recent debt raises by the company.】

item.title: 曼谷大楼倒塌与施工和设计缺陷有关
item.description: 泰国总理巴东塔恩-钦那瓦表示，泰国调查人员得出结论认为，设计和施工方法上的缺陷导致曼谷一幢部分建成的大楼在 3 月 28 日的地震中倒塌，造成至少 89 人死亡。【原文：Thai investigators concluded that flaws in the design and construction methods caused the collapse of a partially built Bangkok building that killed at least 89 people during the March 28 earthquake, according to Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra.】

item.title: 瑞典零售销售下滑迫使瑞典央行再次降息
item.description: 瑞典上个月的零售销售额创下了二十多年来的最大降幅，延续了一连串令人失望的数据，并加大了该国央行再次降息的压力。【原文：Swedish retail sales fell the most in more than two decades last month, continuing a run of disappointing data and increasing pressure on the country’s central bank to lower rates again.】

item.title: 达纳塔拉寻求高达 100 亿美元的贷款，这是东南亚最大的一笔贷款
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，印尼主权财富基金达纳塔拉公司（Danantara）正在寻求高达 100 亿美元的多币种借款，这可能是东南亚最大的一笔贷款。【原文：Indonesian sovereign wealth fund Danantara is seeking a multicurrency borrowing of as much as $10 billion, in what could be Southeast Asia’s largest loan, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 沃达丰启动高达 20 亿欧元的债务招标和新债券销售
item.description: 沃达丰集团（Vodafone Group Plc）周一启动了高达 20 亿欧元的多币种债务招标，同时发布了多期欧元和英镑基准债券发行的初步条款。【原文：Vodafone Group Plc launched an up to €2 billion multi-currency debt tender on Monday while simultaneously releasing initial terms for a multi-tranche offering of euro and sterling benchmark bonds.】

item.title: 德里开发商将投资 20 亿美元促进印度数据中心发展
item.description: Anant Raj 有限公司计划斥资 1,800 亿卢比（约合 21 亿美元）建设数据中心，加入了越来越多的印度公司的行列，这些公司都希望抓住印度人工智能和业务流程主导型服务需求激增的机遇。【原文：Anant Raj Ltd. plans to spend 180 billion rupees ($2.1 billion) on data centers as it joins a growing list of Indian companies looking to ride the boom in demand for artificial intelligence and business process-led services in the country.】

item.title: 马斯克的星链公司希望在南非投资 20 亿兰特
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的星链公司（Starlink）可能会绕过南非的黑人赋权规定以获得运营许可，该公司可能会在南非投资约 20 亿兰特（约合 1.127 亿美元）。【原文：Billionaire Elon Musk’s Starlink, in a potential workaround of South Africa’s Black-empowerment rules to gain an operating license, may invest about 2 billion rand ($112.7 million) in the country, Business Day reported citing sources that it didn’t identify.】

item.title: 锁定期结束后，老铺黄金股价仍将创新高
item.description: 由于对公司前景的乐观情绪超过了去年首次公开募股后部分股票锁定期的到期，老铺黄金公司股价大涨。【原文：Laopu Gold Co. shares surged as optimism over the company’s prospects outweighed the expiry of the lock-up period for some of its stock following its initial public offering last year.】

item.title: 第一季度法郎下滑，瑞士央行置身外汇市场之外
item.description: 年初，瑞士国家银行继续避免操纵瑞士法郎，连续第五个季度基本不参与货币市场，而瑞士法郎对欧元贬值。【原文：The Swiss National Bank continued to refrain from steering the franc at the beginning of the year, largely staying out of currency markets for a fifth consecutive quarter while the currency lost value against the euro.】

item.title: 韩国称美国贸易谈判需持续到下周之后
item.description: 韩国认为与美国的贸易谈判有必要在下周的最后期限之后继续进行，因为首尔将继续寻求美国关税豁免，包括影响汽车和钢铁行业的关税。【原文：South Korea sees the need for trade negotiations with the US to continue past next week’s deadline as Seoul continues to seek exemptions from US tariffs including duties affecting the auto and steel industries.】

item.title: 印尼将放宽进口规则以促进贸易和关税谈判
item.description: 印尼将放宽从化肥到鞋类等商品的进口规定，旨在提高竞争力，支持正在进行的美国关税谈判和其他贸易谈判。【原文：Indonesia will relax import regulations on goods ranging from fertilizers to footwear, aiming to enhance competitiveness and bolster ongoing US tariff talks and other trade negotiations.】

item.title: 加鲁达航空公司正在商谈在致命空难发生多年后重新引进 737 Max 型飞机
item.description: 自2018年PT Lion Mentari航空公司致命坠机事件动摇了人们对波音737 Max 8飞机可靠性的信心以来，资金短缺的印尼加鲁达航空公司（PT Garuda Indonesia）正在商谈将波音公司的737 Max 8飞机重新纳入其机队。【原文：Cash-strapped carrier PT Garuda Indonesia is in talks to bring Boeing Co.’s 737 Max 8 aircraft back to its fleet for the first time since the fatal 2018 PT Lion Mentari Airlines crash shook confidence in the plane’s reliability.】

item.title: 中国首款减肥药问世，可与诺和诺德、礼来抗衡
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）和礼来公司（Eli Lilly & Co）是主导全球肥胖症药物市场的制药巨头，现在它们在中国面临着第一个强劲对手。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S and Eli Lilly & Co, the pharmaceutical giants dominating the global obesity drug market, now face their first serious rival in China.】

item.title: 英国经济增长在税收和关税冲击前已确认居七国集团之首
item.description: 官方数据周一证实，在工党政府增税和美国额外关税生效之前，英国经济在今年第一季度强劲增长。【原文：The UK economy grew strongly in the first quarter of the year, official data confirmed Monday, before the Labour government’s tax hikes and extra US tariffs came into effect.】

item.title: 法国的负电价刚刚超过 2024 年的总电价
item.description: 法国今年电力价格低于零的时间比 2024 年全年都要多，这降低了发电投资者的收益。【原文：French power prices have traded below zero for more hours this year than during all of 2024, reducing returns for investors in power generation.】

item.title: 中国证券监管机构标识改版引来笑声与希望
item.description: 中国证券监管机构出人意料地更换了标识，被股票投资者戏称为预示着近年来市场萎靡不振的局面即将结束。【原文：An unexpected logo change at China’s securities regulator is being teasingly celebrated by stock investors as heralding an end to recent years of market malaise.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑在三月以来最好的一周后上涨
土耳其反对派面临审判，案件令市场惶恐不安
item.description: 土耳其投资者正紧张地等待着对主要反对党命运的判决，最早也要等到周一，此前伊斯坦布尔市长在三月份被捕，导致大量外国人逃离市场。【原文：Investors in Turkey are nervously awaiting a verdict on the fate of the main opposition party as early as Monday, after the arrest of Istanbul’s mayor in March led to an exodus of foreigners from the market.】

item.title: 面对特朗普的出口管制，中国展示科技韧性
item.description: 当唐纳德-特朗普把美国的技术出口管制作为从中国政府手中夺取稀土磁铁供应的筹码时，中国正在展示它在没有美国最先进半导体的情况下能做什么。【原文：As Donald Trump brandishes US export controls on technology as a bargaining chip to wrest supplies of rare earth magnets from Beijing, China is showcasing what it can do without the most advanced American semiconductors.】

item.title: 比特币飙升，替代币在 3000 亿美元加密货币大洗牌中褪色
item.description: 从表面上看，2025 年是加密货币大放异彩的一年：比特币创下历史新高，美国总统大力推动行业发展，其家族也在积极涉足该行业，国会也有望通过重要立法。【原文：On the face of it, 2025 looks like a banner year for crypto: Bitcoin hitting a record, an industry-boosting US president whose family is venturing headlong into the sector, and key legislation widely expected to be passed by Congress.】

item.title: 挪威养老基金将为以色列军方供货的公司列入黑名单
item.description: 挪威最大的私人养老基金将两家国防公司排除在其投资组合之外，理由是这两家公司与以色列军方和加沙战争有关。【原文：Norway’s largest private pension fund has excluded two defense companies from its portfolio, citing their ties to the Israeli military and the war in Gaza.】

item.title: 全球银行可能会反对印度央行的离岸掉期报告计划
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，全球贷款机构计划要求印度央行放宽要求它们报告离岸利率衍生品交易的计划。【原文：Global lenders plan to ask India’s central bank to soften a plan requiring them to report offshore interest-rate derivative trades, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 乌贼游戏》股价下挫，大片乏善可陈
item.description: 在热门剧集《乌贼游戏》（Squid Game）最后一季上映后，与 Netflix 公司的大片系列相关的韩国公司股价周一出现下滑。【原文：Shares in South Korean companies tied to Netflix Inc.’s blockbuster series Squid Game slumped on Monday following the release of the hit show’s final season, which debuted to a lukewarm audience reception despite topping global streaming charts.】
